item.title: By: Hyd
item.dc:creator: Hyd
item.description: I'd give a buck to hold the rights to Populous, just to impress the other old geezers out there that played it on the Amiga way back when. "You want to buy a copy of Populous, you'd better come see _me_!" Then again, they'd probably just pirate it like they did their first copy anyway.
item.content:encoded: I’d give a buck to hold the rights to Populous, just to impress the other old geezers out there that played it on the Amiga way back when. “You want to buy a copy of Populous, you’d better come see _me_!” Then again, they’d probably just pirate it like they did their first copy anyway.
